output:
Music 
 I see your black hair, shining bright yeah, like a raven's wing 
 Your soul is full of love, your soul is full of love, your soul is full of love, your soul is full of love 
 Look at the blue sky, it's like your blue eyes, you got me wondering why 
 Your soul is full of love, your soul is full of love, your soul is full of love, your soul is full of love 
 Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah 
 Look at your soft skin, whiter than hot sin, I know I'm talking, your soul is full of love 
 Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah 
 Do, do, do, do, do, do 
 You pulled me over, over my shoulder, now we're much closer 
 Your soul is full of love, your soul is full of love, your soul is full of love, your soul is full of love! 
 Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah 
 Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, oh! 

 Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah! 

 We bathe in moonshine, like Judas' last wine, 
 We make the cross sign, a soul full of love, our soul full of love, our soul full of love! 
 We hit the open road, we never get towed, look to the open sky, our soul is full of love! 
 Ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah, ah 
 Our souls are full of love! Our souls are full of love!
